plurals.name: playlist_confirm_some_duplicates
plurals.item: This playlist already contains one of these songs. Adding it again will result in this playlist having a duplicated entry.
This playlist already contains some of these songs. Adding them again will result in this playlist having %d duplicated entries.

resources.string: “%1$s” already contains “%2$s”. Do you want to add it again?
This playlist already contains all of these songs. Adding them again will result in %d duplicated entries.
